{{cpp/numeric/math/binary_is|isgreaterequal
|description= Determines if the floating point number {{c|x}} is greater than or equal to the floating-point number {{c|y}}, without setting floating-point exceptions.
|condition={{c|1=x &gt;= y}}
|note=
The built-in {{c/core|1=operator&gt;=}} for floating-point numbers may raise {{lc|FE_INVALID}} if one or both of the arguments is NaN. This function is a "quiet" version of {{c/core|1=operator&gt;=}}.
}}
